name: Minos (EGB Games)
description:
Minos

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Left Mouse - Show Map

Right Mouse - Charge!

Unbind mouse - Escape

Welcome, Minotaur!

As usual your delicious tributes have been thrown into the labyrinth. They scurry to and fro, wondering if they shall escaping, not knowing their fate. Unfortunately the hero Theseus has also infiltrated your maze and is trying to take your tributes from you!

Collect enough tributes to raise your power and defeat Theseus before he escapes!

Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 33. From there and want to give me a ranking? Go here!
